name: Castled.io
headline: Customer Engagement software on top of BigQuery/Snowflake
description:
Castled.io is a Customer Engagement Platform (CEP) that brings the power of data in the warehouse to the marketer.  

Essentially, Castled.io is similar in feature set to Braze, CustomerIO or MoEngage with a major difference - We don't store your customer data. Instead Castled sits on top of your cloud data warehouse to create segments and engage them across channels.

founders.name: Franklin George, Founder
founders.description:
My background is in engineering. I have extensive experience building and scaling enterprise-grade storage systems. I enjoy going deep into a problem and spending days or even weeks thinking about it.

I am starting my entrepreneurial journey with Castled Data and I am fortunate to have the right set of people by my side.

Outside of work I enjoy biking and doing a little bit of whatever it takes to keep me fit. I also like cooking and am always happy to try anything new.

founders.name: Abhilash Thulaseedharan, Founder
founders.description:
As a coder by chance and an entrepreneur by choice, I love to design systems which is to make an impact on the people around me.

15 years of experience in enterprise product development, leading the development of mission-critical systems like flight operations and cargo handling for one of the biggest airlines in the world, where downtime of even a minute meant grounded flights and millions of dollars in loss.

Cycling, running and working out keep me sane.

founders.name: Arun Thulasidharan, Founder
founders.description:
I was the founding engineer of leading startups like MediaIQ and Hevodata and was among the initial 10 employees of both these companies. I have also spent considerable time in large companies like Flipkart and Applied Materials. 

Besides that, I am a huge movie buff and like watching and playing cricket.

# Warehouse native customer engagement
Create complex customer journeys and personalised engagement campaigns using customer data locked securely in your data warehouse.
[Get a Demo](https://castled.io/</engage-demo>)[Try for Free](https://castled.io/<https:/app.castled.io/auth/signup >)
#### Powering leading brands across 10+ countries
![hyundai](https://castled.io/images/companies/hyundai.png)
![FF](https://castled.io/images/companies/ff.svg)
![mix cloud](https://castled.io/images/companies/mixcloud.png)
![cricheroes](https://castled.io/images/companies/cricheroes.png)
![City Furnish](https://castled.io/images/companies/cityfurnish.svg)
![innocean](https://castled.io/images/companies/Innocean.png)
## Data-driven cross channel orchestration powered by your data warehouse
Create the most effective user segments using our visual audience builder to run your dream cross-channel campaigns. Integrate effortlessly with other tools in your marketing ecosystem.
![](https://castled.io/images/homepage/sub-hero-1.svg)
##  Legacy platforms fall short for the modern marketer
The modern marketer leaves no stone unturned to create the best experience for their customers. Legacy platforms with all their inherent limitations simply fail to meet the demands of the modern marketer.
![Insufficient-customer-data](https://cdn.castled.io/website/images/main-page/insufficient-cust-data.webp)
### Incomplete Customer Data
Your customer data is scattered across 50+ data silos including databases, ad platforms and analytics tools in addition to digital touch points like websites & mobile apps.
Legacy Customer Engagement Platforms typically house only 10-15% of your complete customer data, which is insufficient to create a personalised customer experience.
![Volume-Based-Pricing](https://cdn.castled.io/website/images/main-page/volume-based-pricing.webp)
### Data Volume Based Pricing
Legacy platforms penalise you for expanding your customer base by charging you based on the volume of data stored with them — MAUs or number of events.
The ROI of these platforms begins to decline once you surpass initial growth thresholds, ultimately leading to a point where developing an in-house solution becomes the only viable option.
![Vendor-lockin](https://cdn.castled.io/website/images/main-page/vendor-lockin.webp)
### Irreversible Vendor Lockin
Legacy customer engagement platforms sequester your valuable customer data within a proprietary, vendor-controlled black box, over which you have no control.
This constrains your ability to migrate away from a tool that no longer offers justifiable ROI, and forces you to succumb to aggressive sales tactics.
![Data-Security](https://cdn.castled.io/website/images/main-page/data-security.webp)
### Vulnerable Customer Data
Legacy platforms necessitate a physical copy of your customer data to construct segments and orchestrate engagement campaigns.
The data duplication adds a significant vulnerability, especially for companies in regulated industries, thereby escalating the security and compliance risks for your business.
## Unique features  by design
Castled solves the pain points in tradition marketing tools with our unique features, we are able to offer because of our warehouse-native approach.
![](https://castled.io/)![Unparalleled Data Security](https://castled.io/)
### Unparalleled Data Security
Your customer data does not leave the data warehouse, hence Castled is secure by design.
![](https://castled.io/)![Data Consistency](https://castled.io/)
### Data Consistency
Castled considers the data warehouse as the source of truth. Your marketing tool is never out of sync.
![](https://castled.io/)![Cost Effective](https://castled.io/)
### Cost Effective
Castled does not charge by the amount of customer data that gets stored. Pay for the real value you get out of Castled.
![](https://castled.io/)![Unmatched Time to Value ](https://castled.io/)
### Unmatched Time to Value 
Customer Data is already sitting in your data warehouse. Get started in minutes not months.
## Loved by customers and partners
![](https://castled.io/)![left arrow](https://castled.io/)
![](https://castled.io/)![right arrow](https://castled.io/)
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
The future is composability and the customer engagement space is no different: I love what Castled is doing to bring warehouse-native to large scale B2C brands!
![Ashish jha profile image](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/snowplow.png)![1k logo](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/snowplowceo.png)
Alexander Dean
Co-Founder & CEO, Snowplow
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
I am very bullish on the warehouse native marketing stack Castled is building - I can say for sure that its the future.
![Soumyadeb Mitra profile picture](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/rudderstackCeo.png)![Rudderstack profile picture](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/rudderstack.png)
Soumyadeb Mitra
Co-founder & CEO, Rudderstack
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
I never imagined we could power our high-volume push campaigns using our  Snowflake cluster until we discovered Castled.
![Yaron Levi profile image](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/yuvitalCeo.png)![YuviTal logo](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/yuvital.png)
Yaron Levi
Co-Founder & Chief Architect, YuviTal
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
We were collecting all sorts of customer intent data in our BigQuery - GA4, Facebook lead forms and more. Castled finally empowered us to leverage all this data for timely engagement.
![Gourav Kumar profile image](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/innoceanDmm.png)![Innocean logo](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/innocean.png)
Gourav Kumar
Digital Media Manager, Innocean
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
Castled helped us save 70% on our customer engagement costs by eliminating the need to copy our customer data to a third-party, vendor-locked tool.
![1k logo](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/1kHog.png)![Ashish jha profile image](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/1k.png)
Ashish Jha
Head of Growth & Partnerships, 1K
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)
It took us years and a tonne of engineering resources to develop a Castled-like customer engagement platform at Myntra. Having access to Castled back then would have saved us a lot of time.
![Abhinav Dasgupta profile picture](https://castled.io/images/testimonials/abhinav.png)
Abhinav Dasgupta
Ex Head - Customer Retention & CRM, Myntra
#### Be that visionary marketer, make every engagement count
[Get Started](https://castled.io/<https:/app.castled.io/auth/login>)
![castle web](https://castled.io/images/homepage/footer-dark-logo.svg)
Backed by
![](https://castled.io/images/homepage/footer-vertical-line.svg)![YCombinator](https://castled.io/images/ycombinator.svg)
![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)![](https://castled.io/)

generated_description:
**Castled.io: Revolutionizing Customer Engagement through Data Warehouses**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Bengaluru, India, Castled.io is a customer engagement platform that's redefining how marketers interact with their data. Being part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, this startup is making waves with its innovative approach to customer engagement by leveraging existing data in cloud data warehouses like BigQuery and Snowflake.

**What Makes Castled.io Different?**

Unlike conventional platforms like Braze, CustomerIO, or MoEngage, Castled.io doesn’t store your customer data. Instead, it operates on top of your existing data warehouse. This means marketers can create intricate customer segments and engage with their audience effectively across various channels without compromising data security. The platform safeguards your data by keeping it securely within your own infrastructure.

**Key Features:**

1. **Visual Audience Builder**: Easily create tailored customer segments.
2. **Workflow Automation**: Design omnichannel customer journeys.
3. **Data Activation**: Sync your warehouse data with external tools effortlessly.
4. **Engagement Actions**: Gain insights and unlock powerful engagement strategies.
5. **Push Delivery Booster**: Achieve industry-leading delivery rates for push notifications.

**Channels of Engagement:**
Castled.io supports a plethora of channels for customer interaction, including mobile push notifications, email messaging, in-app messaging, app inbox, and even SMS and WhatsApp messaging. This flexibility allows brands to engage their customers where they are, ensuring a cohesive communication strategy.

**Addressing Pain Points:**

Castled.io was born out of necessity, addressing the glaring inadequacies of traditional customer engagement platforms:
- **Data Fragmentation**: It helps unify customer data scattered across multiple platforms.
- **Cost Efficiency**: The platform does not charge based on the volume of customer data stored, allowing companies to save on costs.
- **Vendor Lock-In**: By allowing companies to maintain control over their data, Castled helps avoid the pitfalls of being locked into a single vendor.
- **Data Security**: The customer data remains protected and never leaves your own data warehouse.

**Why Choose Castled.io?**

With a small but dedicated team of eight, Castled.io has already made significant strides, empowering brands across ten countries. Its unique warehouse-native approach and focus on helping marketers create effective, personalized engagement campaigns set it apart. Customers report significant savings—up to 70%—on their engagement costs thanks to its efficient model.

In a world where customer interactions matter more than ever, Castled.io offers a compelling solution that combines the power of your data with smart, flexible tools to enhance customer engagement. If you want to stay ahead in marketing while keeping your customer data secure, Castled.io is a platform worth exploring.

For a deeper dive into what they offer, check out their website: [Castled.io](https://castled.io).
